title: HTTP Message Signatures Key Directory
description: Key directory for HTTP Message Signatures verification per draft-meunier-http-message-signatures-directory

kty.description: Key type - must be OKP for Ed25519

x.description: Base64url-encoded public key (32 bytes for Ed25519)

kid.description: Key ID - typically the JWK thumbprint

keys.description: Array of Ed25519 public keys for signature verification

agentCredentialUrl.description: URL to fetch the agent's credential JWT for full identity verification
